author: Staff Reporter
text:
Chief Judicial Magistrate S. Malarmathy on Tuesday, through videoconference, extended the judicial custody of S. Yuvaraj, the prime accused in the murder case of Dalit youth V. Gokulraj, till February 16.

Yuvaraj is currently lodged at Vellore Central Prison. His two petitions seeking bail was dismissed by another court last month. The CB-CID team had filed a 725-page charge sheet against Yuvaraj and 16 others in the sensational murder that took place on June 24, 2015. The district administration had detained seven persons, including Yuvaraj, under the Goondas Act.
title: Judicial custody of Yuvaraj extended till February 16
